com.cube.storm.util.lib.resolver

Class Resolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cube.storm.util.lib.resolver.Resolver
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AssetsResolver, FileResolver

    public abstract class Resolver
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract resolver class that helps to resolve a Uri to its correct Uri (in case of custom Uri schemes) and to resolve files from a Uri
    Author:
    Callum Taylor

      Resolver()

    • Constructor Detail

      • Resolver

        public Resolver()

    • Method Detail

      • resolveUri

        public Uri resolveUri(java.lang.String uri)
        Resolves a string uri into a correct uri. Use this method to convert from a custom uri scheme into a standard one such as `cache://` to `file://` or `assets://`
        Parameters:
        uri - The uri to resolve
        Returns:
        The resolved uri or null

      • resolveUri

        public abstract Uri resolveUri(Uri uri)
        Resolves a string uri into a correct uri. Use this method to convert from a custom uri scheme into a standard one such as `cache://` to `file://` or `assets://`
        Parameters:
        uri - The uri to resolve
        Returns:
        The resolved uri or null

      • resolveFile

        public abstract byte[] resolveFile(Uri uri)
        Resolves a file from the given uri. This will load the file synchronously.
        Parameters:
        uri - The uri to resolve
        Returns:
        The raw byte data of the loaded file, or null
